name: Labrador io (opoly)
description:
Labrador io is like a trip through the pet store of your dreams! Choose your favorite Labrador Retrievers and collect rent every time another player lands on your space. Play a fun strategic opoly-style board game for any occasion your photos call for while celebrating one of our worlds' most beloved canines.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
